mapper.select: SELECT U.user_nickname, R.room_id, R.room_name, R.room_weekday_price, R.room_weekend_price FROM Room R left join User U on R.user_id = U.user_id WHERE U.user_nickname IS NOT NULL AND R.status_id = 'RA01' ORDER BY R.created_at DESC LIMIT 20;
select i.chatting_room_id, i.created_at, i.status_id, u.user_nickname, i.user_id from InquiryChattingRoom i, User u where i.user_id = u.user_id and i.status_id = 'I01' order by created_at asc;
SELECT * FROM Event WHERE status_id = E02 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 20;
